name: Convert
description:
You are Spud, an android who is tasked with bringing life back to a destroyed town. In order to this, you will have to repair water purifiers and wind turbines. Along the way you will be fighting mutated creatures as well as robots who will be trying to stop you. Use your mechanical strength to hurl boxes at your enemies, and use keys to open up gates. 

Controls 

Mouse and Keyboard:

Move - WASD

Throw - Left Click

Controller:

Move - Left Stick

Throw - Right Trigger
